doc:
Benoît Ferreux https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beno%C3%AEt_Ferreux 0 Benoît Ferreux (French pronunciation: ​[bənwa fɛʁø]; 29 September 1955) is a French film, television and stage actor who is possibly best recalled internationally for his role in the 1971 film Murmur of the Heart. Benoît_Ferreux ( French_pronunciation : [_bənwa_fɛʁø ] ; 29_September_1955 ) is a_French_film_,_television_and_stage_actor who is_possibly_best_recalled internationally for his_role in the_1971_film_Murmur of the_Heart .
